parameter.name: id
parameter.description: The logical Id of the resource

parameter.name: patient
parameter.description: Search observation resources for a specified patient ID.

parameter.name: code
parameter.description: Search for Observation resources for a valid LOINC code

parameter.name: category
parameter.description: Search for Observation resources for a valid category (vital-signs, social-history, laboratory).

parameter.name: startDate
parameter.description: search for a given set of result- or vital sign-based Observations by specifying the start date for when the observation was resulted or recorded

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.description: search for a given set of result- or vital sign-based Observations by specifying the end date for when the observation was resulted or recorded

parameter.name: startIssued
parameter.description: search for a smoking history Observations by specifying the start date when the observation was recorded.

parameter.name: endIssued
parameter.description: search for a smoking history Observations by specifying the end date when the observation was recorded.

property.name: ERROR
property.value: No supported Mandatory search parameters provided

payloadFactory.format: { "Error":{ "errorType":"InvalidParameter","details":"at least one of the id and patient parameters must be provided " } }
